channel.title: Detection on Ji Molloy
channel.description: Recent content in Detection on Ji Molloy

item.title: ☁ Google Cloud Next Series ☁️🔐 Building Smarter, Safer Cloud Systems Together 🛡️💻✨
item.description:
Hey tech fam! 👋 Ever felt like juggling cloud security, detection engineering, and scalable policies is like herding cats? 🐱 Well, grab a cuppa ☕ and settle in, because today we’re unpacking some exciting strategies and tools to level up your cloud game — from securing Google Cloud to building composite detections and managing default service accounts. Let’s dive in! 🚀

🔍 Detection Engineering with Google SecOps Detection engineering isn’t just about catching threats — it’s about building a smart, scalable detection machine 🛠️. With Google SecOps, detection becomes modular, testable, and highly effective.
